summary: Veterinary case management app with a Dashboard featuring patient cards and a New Case workflow. Recent focus on UI improvements: smaller patient cards, species icons (colored animal silhouettes), navigation changes, and search enhancements.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Solid dog silhouette icon in warm amber/orange tone (dog-silhouette.dim_64x64.png)
- Solid cat silhouette icon in teal/green tone (cat-silhouette.dim_64x64.png)
- Solid rabbit silhouette icon in lavender/purple tone for Other species (other-animal-silhouette.dim_64x64.png)
